Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/103rd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 100th and Commercial : due to, street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Torrence, 100th, Commercial and over regular route, due to street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 95th/Rhodes
ShortDescription: Westbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 93rd, Cottage Grove, 87th, King Dr, 95th, due to street blockage near 95th/Rhodes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 93rd, Cottage Grove, 87th, King Dr, 95th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 95th/Rhodes.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
